paper_abstract: The Takagi-Sugeno (T-S) model of fuzzy delay systems with impulse is first presented in this paper. By means of classical analysis methods and Razumikhin technique, the criteria of uniform stability and uniform asymptotic stability for T-S fuzzy delay systems with impulse are obtained, respectively. Three numerical examples are also discussed to illustrate the efficiency of the obtained results.
paper_title: Stability of Takagi-Sugeno Fuzzy Delay Systems With Impulse
